summary: A young wizard conjures a spell that puts her family in jeopardy.
cast: Selena Gomez|David Henrie|Jake T. Austin|Jennifer Stone|Maria Canals-Barrera|David DeLuise|Steve Valentine|Xavier Torres|Jennifer Alden|Jazmín Caratini|Jonathan Dwayne|Marisé Álvarez|Bettina Mercado|Veraalba Santa|Gabriela Rosario|Eldim Correa|Nicole Diaz|Ramiro 'Ramir' Delgado Ruiz|Dakota LeFronk|Susan Pages|Logan Raskin|Ruby|Xen Sams|Lei'lah Star
title: Los magos de Waverly Place: Vacaciones en el Caribe
